    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/110138</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/110138</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Raziskovalec, osnovne funkcije</string>
            <string language="en">Explorer - basic functions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forscher - grundlegende Funktionen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Explorateur - fonctions de base</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explorador - funções básicas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esploratore - funzioni di base</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξερευνητής - βασικές λειτουργίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Explorador - funciones básicas</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenec razume delovanje raziskovalca. Učenec zna zagnati raziskovalca. Učenec razume drevesno strukturo pogonov in map. Učenec zna odpreti mapo.</string>
            <string language="en">Lesson plan for teaching Microsoft Windows Explorer - basic operations (opening folder, traveling up and down in tree, ...).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">raziskovalec</string>
            <string language="en">explorer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">drevesna struktura</string>
            <string language="en">tree structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">datoteka</string>
            <string language="en">file</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mapa</string>
            <string language="en">folder</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan für das Unterrichten des Microsoft Windows 
Forschers - grundlegende Operationen (Öffnung Heft, auf und ab 
reisend in Baum...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de leçon pour enseigner l'explorateur de 
Microsoft Windows - exécutions de base (chemise d'ouverture, voyageant en 
haut et en bas dans l'arbre...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta da lição para ensinar o explorador de 
Microsoft Windows - operações básicas (dobrador da abertura, 
viajando acima e para baixo na árvore...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma di lezione per l'istruzione 
dell'esploratore di Microsoft Windows - funzionamenti di base 
(dispositivo di piegatura di apertura, mobile su e giù 
nell'albero...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος για τον εξερευνητή Windows της 
Microsoft διδασκαλίας - βασικές διαδικασίες (γραμματοθήκη 
ανοίγματος, που ταξιδεύει πάνω-κάτω στο δέντρο...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plan de la lección para enseñar a explorador de 
Microsoft Windows - operaciones básicas (carpeta de la apertura, viajando 
hacia arriba y hacia abajo en árbol...).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forscher</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Baumstruktur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Datei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">explorateur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">structure arborescente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fichier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chemise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">explorador</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estrutura de árvore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lima</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dobrador</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esploratore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">struttura arborescente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">archivio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dispositivo di piegatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξερευνητής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δομή δέντρων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αρχείο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμματοθήκη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">explorador</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estructura arborescente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fichero</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">carpeta</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
